Description: The FHIR Location resource defines details and position information for a physical place where resources and participants can be found. The Location resource is referenced by the Practitioner and references Organization in an effort to provide a more complete context in associating a patient or supply with a physical location.
SampleResponse:
<Location xmlns="http://hl7.org/fhir">

<id value="eMRHhr1Ry-G-RV0fqAju6kA3"/>

<identifier>

<use value="usual" />

<system value="urn:oid:1.2.840.114350.1.13.5325.1.7.2.696570" />

<value value="3229" />

</identifier>

<name value="Initial Department"/>

<description

value="Take Whitney Way south from the Beltline, turn right onto Tokay Blvd., and you will see the Clinic on your right."/>

<mode value="instance"/>

<address>

<line value="125 Milky Way"/>

<city value="Verona"/>

<state value="Wisconsin"/>

<postalCode value="54553"/>

<country value="United States of America"/>

</address>

<managingOrganization>

<reference value="Organization/e9OtaUAOSwwwfGDaKD43WbA3"/>

<display value="Epic FACILITY"/>

</managingOrganization>

<partOf>

<reference value="Location/eDvShAeUfxUlbCN1A6OATOQ3"/>

<display value="Epic FACILITY"/>

</partOf>

</Location>

Location.Name: Location
Location.Description: An instance of the R4 Location FHIR resource.

alias.Name: alias
alias.Description: A list of alternative names that the location is known as or was known as in the past.

description.Name: description
description.Description: Additional details about the location that can be shown to further identify the location.

endpoint.Name: endpoint
endpoint.Description: The endpoint reference, such as a location or provider.

identifier.Name: identifier
identifier.Description: Unique IDs associated with the location. This element is available starting in the February 2022 version of Epic, or in the August and November 2021 versions by special update.

managingOrganization.Name: managingOrganization
managingOrganization.Description: Organization responsible for provisioning and upkeep, typically the parent hospital/clinic area for this location.

mode.Name: mode
mode.Description: Epic supports only an instance value in this element. Instance is a specific, findable location.

partOf.Name: partOf
partOf.Description: Another location that this location is part of.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The active status of a location (active, inactive, etc.).

telecom.Name: telecom
telecom.Description: The contact details of the location.
